creator: Hine, Lewis Wickes, 1874-1940
reproduction_number: LC-DIG-nclc-04772 (color digital file from b&w original print)
title: Some of the smallest boys in Cass & Daley Shoe Co., Salem. Stephen Indroski, (right end), 19 Turner St., has worked a year and a half in the factory. William Prasecki (next Stephen), 36 Peabody St., has worked two months in factory. Brony Geiski (next William), 43 Union St., probably over 14. Edwin Skunecki (left end), 25 Daniel St., has worked in factory one year. Noon.  Location: Salem, Massachusetts.
